title: Anything you can do, you can do better.
para1: The App Store has over a million apps specifically designed for the big, beautiful Retina display of your iPad.* So whatever you love to do, thereâ€™s an iPad app to help you do it.
para2: iOS 11 brings iPad to life like never before. New features and capabilities let you get more done, more quickly and easily, making it a phenomenally powerful and personal experience.
